channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ID
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ID

item.title: Report X-2023090396
item.description:
Report X-2023090396

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-01
  • City: BOISE
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PM QA discovered package leaking in truck When it returned. Employee put on proper PPE. Package was contained and placed in a lined hazmat bin. Bin was then placed in Hazmat cage under the air vent. DescribePack: There was a leak at the bottom of the box and half of the content on one of the bottles spilled. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Employee put on proper PPE. Package was contained and placed in a lined hazmat bin. Bin was then placed in Hazmat cage under the air vent.
